clearcontrol.devices.cameras

Class CameraDeviceBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • clearcontrol.core.device.name.NameableBase
      • clearcontrol.core.device.NameableWithChangeListener<VirtualDevice>
        • clearcontrol.core.device.VirtualDevice
          • clearcontrol.devices.cameras.CameraDeviceBase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HasChangeListenerInterface<VirtualDevice>, NameableInterface, ReadOnlyNameableInterface, OpenCloseDeviceInterface, ReOpenDeviceInterface, LoggingFeature, CameraDeviceInterface
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    StackCameraDeviceBase

    public abstract class CameraDeviceBase
extends VirtualDevice
implements CameraDeviceInterface, LoggingFeature
    Base class providing common fields and methods for all camera devices.
    Author:
    royer
